…

tweets.author_name: Eric Goldman Likes the Star Wars
tweets.html:
And that, kids, is why this is one of my favorite TV shows ever... #Hannibal

— Eric Goldman Likes the Star Wars (@TheEricGoldman) August 30, 2015

Laugh-crying because “what even just happened” is what just happened. Again. #hannibal

— Notorious RBF (@stringertheory) August 30, 2015

This is the most amazing ending to #Hannibal and so much more than I'd dared to hope for. #MurderHusbands

— mesk (@_mesk) August 30, 2015

I literally don’t know what to do with myself right now. What DO you do after something like that? #hannibal

— Notorious RBF (@stringertheory) August 30, 2015

so did the Hannibal finale have as many organ-eating scenes as the Mad Men finale or did it wuss out?

— Rowan Kaiser (@RowanKaiser) August 30, 2015

We have reached the end of this part of #Hannibal, but remember: #Fannibal is forever. We’ll always have each other.

— Notorious RBF (@stringertheory) August 30, 2015

brb, need to hug my television #hannibal

— Notorious RBF (@stringertheory) August 30, 2015

If anyone wants to learn how to do fan service correctly, please to consult Mr @BryanFuller. #Hannibal #HannibalMicDrop

— Misha (ミシェル) (@mekkalekkah) August 30, 2015

#Hannibal left me damaged. I want @BryanFuller to pay for my therapy. Wait, that is probably a terrible idea.

— BurnThemAll (@aboleyn) August 30, 2015

i don't think Hannibal would be nearly as terrifying if it made sense.

— Daniel Walters (@danieltwalters) August 30, 2015

EAT ME, FANNIBALS!!!!! @NBCHannibal @BryanFuller @DeLaurentiisCo @neoprod

— Gillian Anderson (@GillianA) August 30, 2015

Dear @BryanFuller: I am hearing a resounding "YES" from Fannibals to your question if we want more #Hannibal. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes.

This is now a world with no more #Justified #MadMen or #Hannibal & it feels less vibrant.
